title: Holly Willoughby ignores â€˜x-rated photo hackingâ€™ scandal as she gets back to her day job on This Morning
text:
Holly and Philip were back on our tellyboxes (Picture: ITV) She may have been targeted by hackers claiming to have seen â€˜x-ratedâ€™ photos, but that wasnâ€™t going to stop Holly Willoughby from presenting This Morning in her usual chirpy way.
Chef Gino D'Acampo caught watering plants with white wine on This Morning The 36-year-old was back on the sofa after her stint with Philip Schofield on Ant and Decâ€™s Saturday Night Takeaway taking part in a laughing challenge .
And nothing phased the telly show host â€“ even Gino Dâ€™Acampo watering the plants with white wine .
The Sun reported that the This Morning host had be threatened by the hackers who said they would post the snaps online for â€˜humiliationâ€™ .
Paul Hollywood has just been told the exact day he is going to die on Loose Women 
Neighbours: Susan discovers Dee's true identity but can she get to Toadie in time? 
But one thing did get viewers talking â€“ travel expert Simon Calder hinting the presented could be pregnant with her fourth child.
Talking about holiday destinations for pregnant women or women who wanted to become pregnant, Simon said they should avoid ZIka-affected areas.
Simon Calder was discussing safe places to travel for pregnant women (Picture: ITV) But a remark he made got the internet all freaking out. He said: â€˜Zika is a nasty, mosquito-born disease. For people like me and Phillip it doesnâ€™t matter at all â€“ we might feel lousy for a few days.
â€˜But anyone who is pregnant or thinking of becoming pregnant it can be quite serious.â€™
And fans went wild, thinking because heâ€™d left out Holly, he was hinting she could be up the duff.
#ThisMorning @thismorning 'me and Phil are okay, but people who are pregnant or trying' Holly? 
â€” Claire Bowie (@clairebowie_) March 20, 2017 
Didn't include Holly in his comment about Zika but said it affects people who are pregnant or thinking of getting pregnant #ThisMorning ðŸ¤”
â€” Jack Wetherill (@JackWetherill) March 20, 2017 

The comment comes just days after Philip joked he didnâ€™t want Holly getting preggers again .
He said: â€˜I wonâ€™t let Holly have more children because she has time off the showâ€¦ I snuck in one night and gave Dan [Hollyâ€™s husband] the snip! He still doesnâ€™t realiseâ€™.
But it didnâ€™t go down too well with everyone .
To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video 
Calm down internet, it was probs just an off-the-hand comment.
Unless youâ€™ve got anything to tell us, Holly?
